key_facts.fact: Bitcoin blockchain is on the order of 600 gigabytes currently
key_facts.speaker: Lukas Aumayr

key_facts.fact: In Bitcoin folklore, the unstable part is usually taken to be six blocks

key_facts.fact: We could download a 1.6 kilobyte proof instead of 600 gigabytes

key_facts.fact: We require a proof of length 2k plus 1
key_facts.speaker: Lukas Aumayr

key_facts.fact: If we assume k to be 6, we would require 13 block headers to send and verify
